Array.name: Milcang
Array.description: A unique slime with a mottled pattern. Did it swallow a cow or something?

Array.name: Buddy
Array.description: A small bird that flew in from who knows where. It occasionally sings to call its kin.

Array.name: Mearing
Array.description: A pastel-toned, squishy slime. Surprisingly, it feels quite solid like rubber when poked.

Array.name: Honeyoinky
Array.description: A monster that flies around looking for honey. The stinger on its tail is not as strong as you might think.

Array.name: Mushlong
Array.description: A mushroom-shaped monster with a cute appearance, but not-so-cute traits.

Array.name: Fluffing
Array.description: A fluffy white monster. Itâ€™s gentle, but eats crops on its own.
